content: This is a **list of underpasses and tunnels in [Singapore](/wiki/Singapore)**. Only vehicular underpasses and tunnels with official names are shown below. ## List of underpasses UnderpassRoadCrosses underAdam UnderpassSlip road connecting [PIE](/wiki/Pan_Island_Expressway) to Lornie HighwayLornie RoadAnak Bukit UnderpassJalan Anak BukitJalan Jurong KechilAng Mo Kio UnderpassAng Mo Kio Avenue 3, Hougang Avenue 2Yio Chu Kang RoadBraddell UnderpassBraddell Road[Central Expressway](/wiki/Central_Expressway,_Singapore) (CTE), Braddell FlyoverBukit Timah Underpass[Bukit Timah Road](/wiki/Bukit_Timah_Road)Adam Road, Farrer Road, Farrer FlyoverClementi Avenue 6 UnderpassClementi Avenue 6Commonwealth Avenue WestDunearn UnderpassDunearn RoadAdam Road, Farrer Road, Farrer FlyoverFarrer UnderpassFarrer Road, Queensway[Holland Road](/wiki/Holland_Road,_Singapore), Holland FlyoverLornie UnderpassLornie RoadLornie HighwayNicoll UnderpassSlip road connecting Sims Way and [KPE](/wiki/Kallang%E2%80%93Paya_Lebar_Expressway) to [Nicoll Highway](/wiki/Nicoll_Highway)Sims Way, [Nicoll Highway](/wiki/Nicoll_Highway)Queensway UnderpassQueenswayCommonwealth AvenueRifle Range UnderpassSlip road connecting [PIE](/wiki/Pan_Island_Expressway) to Jalan Anak Bukit[Pan Island Expressway](/wiki/Pan_Island_Expressway) (PIE)Sime UnderpassLornie Road, Kheam Hock RoadLornie HighwayT4 UnderpassT4 UnderpassAirport Boulevard, T4 BoulevardTuas Underpass[Pan Island Expressway](/wiki/Pan_Island_Expressway) (PIE)[Jalan Ahmad Ibrahim](/wiki/Jalan_Ahmad_Ibrahim), [Ayer Rajah Expressway](/wiki/Ayer_Rajah_Expressway) (AYE), Tuas Road, Tuas FlyoverTuas West Underpass[Ayer Rajah Expressway](/wiki/Ayer_Rajah_Expressway) (AYE)Tuas West RoadUpper Paya Lebar UnderpassUpper Paya Lebar Road[Bartley Road](/wiki/Bartley_Road), Bartley Road East, Bartley ViaductWoodleigh Underpass[Bartley Road](/wiki/Bartley_Road), Braddell RoadUpper Serangoon Road, Serangoon Viaduct ## List of tunnels TunnelRoadCrosses under[Chin Swee Tunnel](/wiki/Chin_Swee_Tunnel)[Central Expressway](/wiki/Central_Expressway,_Singapore) (CTE)[Orchard Road](/wiki/Orchard_Road), Penang Road, Clemenceau Avenue, Oxley Flyover, River Valley Road, [Singapore River](/wiki/Singapore_River), Merchant Road, Havelock Road, Chin Swee Road[Fort Canning Tunnel](/wiki/Fort_Canning_Tunnel)Fort Canning LinkCanning Rise, Fort Canning Road[Kampong Java Tunnel](/wiki/Kampong_Java_Tunnel)[Central Expressway](/wiki/Central_Expressway,_Singapore) (CTE)[Bukit Timah Road](/wiki/Bukit_Timah_Road), Cavenagh RoadKPE Tunnel[Kallang-Paya Lebar Expressway](/wiki/Kallang-Paya_Lebar_Expressway) (KPE)[Kallang](/wiki/Kallang), [Geylang](/wiki/Geylang), [Hougang](/wiki/Hougang), [Paya Lebar](/wiki/Paya_Lebar)MCE Tunnel[Marina Coastal Expressway](/wiki/Marina_Coastal_Expressway) (MCE)[Marina South](/wiki/Marina_South), [Marina Channel](/wiki/Marina_Channel), [Marina East](/wiki/Marina_East), [Kallang](/wiki/Kallang)Sentosa Gateway TunnelSentosa GatewayTelok Blangah Road, [West Coast Highway](/wiki/West_Coast_Highway,_Singapore), Kampong Bahru RoadWoodsville TunnelBendemeer Road, MacPherson Road, Serangoon Road, Upper Serangoon RoadJalan Kolam Ayer, Jalan Toa Payoh, [Pan Island Expressway](/wiki/Pan_Island_Expressway) (PIE), Woodsville Flyover - [List of bridges in Singapore](/wiki/List_of_bridges_in_Singapore)
title: List of underpasses and tunnels in Singapore
